com.cloudant.sync.replication

Class ReplicationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.cloudant.sync.replication.ReplicationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, ReplicationPolicyManager.ReplicationsCompletedListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PeriodicReplicationService

    public abstract class ReplicationService
extends android.app.Service
implements ReplicationPolicyManager.ReplicationsCompletedListener
    This abstract class forms the basis for creating replication policies on Android. The replications run in a Service so that they can properly manage the lifecycle and handle being killed or restarted by the operating system

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReplicationService.LocalBinder 
      static interface  ReplicationService.ReplicationCompleteListener 
      static class  ReplicationService.SimpleReplicationCompleteListener
      A simple ReplicationService.ReplicationCompleteListener to save clients having to override every method if they are only interested in a subset of the events.
